Reshape CI between wide/long formats

Source: R/reshape_ci.R
reshape_ci.Rd

Reshape CI between wide/long formats.

reshape_ci(x)

Arguments

x

A data.frame containing CI_low and CI_high.

Examples

library(bayestestR)

x <- data.frame(replicate(4, rnorm(100)))
x <- ci(x, ci = c(0.68, 0.89, 0.95))
reshape_ci(x)

#>   Parameter CI_low_0.68 CI_high_0.68 CI_low_0.89 CI_high_0.89 CI_low_0.95
#> 1        X1  -1.0283674    1.1361413   -1.268945     1.736463   -1.772931
#> 2        X2  -1.0058543    0.7886629   -1.425960     1.506810   -2.003771
#> 3        X3  -0.8606764    1.2167014   -1.368918     1.784742   -1.581339
#> 4        X4  -0.9785388    1.1577853   -1.572820     1.540995   -2.011927
#>   CI_high_0.95
#> 1     2.004190
#> 2     1.626684
#> 3     1.877980
#> 4     1.936843
reshape_ci(reshape_ci(x))

#>    Parameter   CI     CI_low   CI_high
#> 1         X1 0.68 -1.0283674 1.1361413
#> 2         X1 0.89 -1.2689445 1.7364630
#> 3         X1 0.95 -1.7729310 2.0041899
#> 4         X2 0.68 -1.0058543 0.7886629
#> 5         X2 0.89 -1.4259597 1.5068098
#> 6         X2 0.95 -2.0037710 1.6266838
#> 7         X3 0.68 -0.8606764 1.2167014
#> 8         X3 0.89 -1.3689182 1.7847418
#> 9         X3 0.95 -1.5813393 1.8779802
#> 10        X4 0.68 -0.9785388 1.1577853
#> 11        X4 0.89 -1.5728196 1.5409946
#> 12        X4 0.95 -2.0119268 1.9368427

x <- data.frame(replicate(4, rnorm(100)))
x <- describe_posterior(x, ci = c(0.68, 0.89, 0.95))
reshape_ci(x)

#>   Parameter       Median CI_low_0.95 CI_high_0.95 CI_low_0.68 CI_high_0.68
#> 1        X1 -0.035621578   -1.556132     1.758079  -0.8216807    0.9444641
#> 2        X2  0.195626928   -1.599301     2.010413  -0.8473286    1.0477185
#> 3        X3 -0.020946056   -2.023973     1.689505  -1.1146402    0.7927846
#> 4        X4  0.002044898   -1.718488     1.944616  -1.1947553    0.5969643
#>   CI_low_0.89 CI_high_0.89   pd ROPE_CI ROPE_low ROPE_high ROPE_Percentage
#> 1   -1.433428     1.359016 0.52      89     -0.1       0.1      0.12222222
#> 2   -1.488663     1.582404 0.56      89     -0.1       0.1      0.07777778
#> 3   -1.642995     1.423688 0.51      89     -0.1       0.1      0.10000000
#> 4   -1.194755     1.944616 0.52      89     -0.1       0.1      0.11111111
reshape_ci(reshape_ci(x))

#>    Parameter       Median   CI     CI_low   CI_high   pd ROPE_CI ROPE_low
#> 1         X1 -0.035621578 0.68 -0.8216807 0.9444641 0.52      89     -0.1
#> 2         X1 -0.035621578 0.89 -1.4334276 1.3590163 0.52      89     -0.1
#> 3         X1 -0.035621578 0.95 -1.5561321 1.7580788 0.52      89     -0.1
#> 4         X2  0.195626928 0.68 -0.8473286 1.0477185 0.56      89     -0.1
#> 5         X2  0.195626928 0.89 -1.4886635 1.5824044 0.56      89     -0.1
#> 6         X2  0.195626928 0.95 -1.5993005 2.0104126 0.56      89     -0.1
#> 7         X3 -0.020946056 0.68 -1.1146402 0.7927846 0.51      89     -0.1
#> 8         X3 -0.020946056 0.89 -1.6429951 1.4236881 0.51      89     -0.1
#> 9         X3 -0.020946056 0.95 -2.0239728 1.6895050 0.51      89     -0.1
#> 10        X4  0.002044898 0.68 -1.1947553 0.5969643 0.52      89     -0.1
#> 11        X4  0.002044898 0.89 -1.1947553 1.9446157 0.52      89     -0.1
#> 12        X4  0.002044898 0.95 -1.7184875 1.9446157 0.52      89     -0.1
#>    ROPE_high ROPE_Percentage
#> 1        0.1      0.12222222
#> 2        0.1      0.12222222
#> 3        0.1      0.12222222
#> 4        0.1      0.07777778
